name: MusicRelease
description: A MusicRelease is a specific release of a music album.
title: MusicRelease

fields.name: recordLabel
fields.title: recordLabel
fields.description: The label that issued the release.

fields.name: catalogNumber
fields.title: catalogNumber
fields.description: The catalog number for the release.

fields.name: creditedTo
fields.title: creditedTo
fields.description: The group the release is credited to if different than the byArtist. For example, Red and Blue is credited to "Stefani Germanotta Band", but by Lady Gaga.

fields.name: releaseOf
fields.title: releaseOf
fields.description: The album this is a release of.

fields.name: duration
fields.title: duration
fields.description: The duration of the item (movie, audio recording, event, etc.) in ISO 8601 date format.

fields.name: musicReleaseFormat
fields.title: musicReleaseFormat
fields.description: Format of this release (the type of recording media used, ie. compact disc, digital media, LP, etc.).
